snippet.title: Doodle Dice Monsters - 2023 Game Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Doodle Dice Monsters on Steam today! https://store.steampowered.com/app/2454170/Doodle_Dice_Monsters/

DDM is a fast and strategic turn-based game where you get to draw your own characters! Form your six character dream team, then fight in tag-team combat in either multi-player or single-player mode: the winner not only gets epic loot, but gets to take one of the defeated Doodlemon for their own!
